product_name: Manduka Commuter Mat Yoga Mat Sling
long_description: The Manduka Commuter Mat sling wraps around your yoga mat, giving you a convenient carry handle that keeps your mat from unrolling in transit. Innovative gravity cinch loops will fit around any size mat; simply loop it around the mat & let gravity do the work. Padded shoulder strap for ultimate comfort.
short_description: The Manduka Commuter Mat sling wraps around your yoga mat, giving you a convenient carry handle that keeps your mat from unrolling in transit.
